attributes.action: Abolish the UK Passport fee for people who are 65 or over.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Other European states give their pensioners passports for free. £72 is a very large expense for a pensioner who may just be using it once a year to go on holiday. The Republic of Ireland manage to give their pensioners a free passport and so should we.
